title: 查看某个种子的建筑生成的软件
author: aaztm
txt_content: 不要小地图，直接在电脑上运行的。能详细列出地牢等坐标的

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content: 地牢生成比较复杂 下搜索刷怪笼的软件或Minutor吧

replies.author: OAO_miao
replies.txt_content: http://www.minecraftforum.net/fo ... ge-biome-etc-finder 这个工具可以寻找要塞和神庙 但是不能寻找地牢

replies.author: aaztm
replies.txt_content:
OAO_miao 发表于 2015-1-24 11:09
http://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/mapping-and-modding/minecraft-tools/1262200-v3-6-amidst-strongh ...
可是我要寻找地牢的
